CONN_DB_ERR: No ha sido posible conectar con %s
HTTP_402: Do you need a premium account.
HTTP_503: Service under maintainance. Sorry for the inconvenience.
REDIRECT: You will be redirected to login page after %d seconds.
API_TARGET_ERR: No se ha especificado atributo action para este formulario
EMAIL_TAKEN: Email address is already in use.
FORGOT_STEP1: Type the email address associated to your account.
FORGOT_STEP2: En unos minutos recibirá un email con la nueva contraseña.
GENERIC_EMAIL_SENT: An email has been sent to your inbox.
DELETE_ACCOUNT_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to permanently delete your account? The process will be irreversible.
DISABLE_ACCOUNT_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to deactivate your account? You will not be able to log in again.
NAME: Name
HELLO_WORLD: Everything seems to work correctly. You must test the languages and user login.
DEV_REG_ON: The development registration is activated. To create a new user, enter your email and password on the login screen.
LAYOUT_EXAMPLE2: The layouts are html templates with the general design of the web.
PAGE_EXAMPLE2: The pages can be loaded within the layouts to avoid duplication of code.
